story.text: Jan 3 Ramco-Gershenson Properties Trust (RPT.N) said the Internal Revenue Service decided not to pursue its proposed disqualification of the company as a real estate investment trust. The IRS found no tax deficiencies on the part of the company for the years ended Dec. 31, 1996 through Dec. 31, 2000, Ramco-Gershenson said in a statement. (Reporting by Sayantani Ghosh in Bangalore)
story.title: ramco - gershenson says irs not to pursue disqualification as reit
